mainSection.header: I'm a Full Stack Software Engineer experienced in JavaScript and Python frameworks.
mainSection.about: Hello! My name is Daniel and I enjoy problem-solving and figuring out how things work. I'm a full stack engineer with an emphasis on frontend development with React. I have a great appreciation for beautiful UI/UX design and love being a part of that process. When I'm not working on a project, I'm probably trying to beat my scores on the Peloton or planning my next travel destination.

experienceSection.description: Although I loved health care and treating patients, there was still something missing from my career. I always found the greatest joy when I am able to create something. Whether it's my photography, cooking, or cycling; seeing my effort turn into something beautiful or useful to others is what truly gives me meaning.

experiences.name: App Academy
experiences.description: One year, Part time Full Stack Software Engineering Bootcamp

experiences.name: Stony Brook University
experiences.description: B.S in Health Science and Minor in Biology

projectSection.name: DocuSync
projectSection.description: DocuSync is a clone of Google Docs, a collaborative document editing tool that allows multiple users to work on the same document in real-time. It is similar to Google Docs in that it enables users to create, edit, and share documents. It also includes features such as commenting, live chat, and the ability to grant different levels of access to different users.

projectSection.name: Instantgram
projectSection.description: A clone of a popular social media platform, Instagram. Instagram is a social media platform that allows users to share photos and videos, as well as to interact with others through likes, comments, and direct messaging. The app is known for its sleek, user-friendly interface and powerful editing tools that allow users to enhance their photos and videos with filters, stickers, and other creative features.

projectSection.name: Let's Meetup
projectSection.description: A clone of a popular social media platform, MeetUp. Users on Let's Meetup may host live/online events, organize groups, and meet like-minded peers based on interests, hobbies, professions, and more. Sequelize was used to organize and build the many relationships for the database and React was used for the frontend UI.

projectSection.name: Meet Me at Midnight
projectSection.description: This project was a collaborative effort between a Designer/Swifty, Jackie Zen, to celebrate Taylor Swift's 10th studio album, "Midnight". By utilizing Spotify's iFrame API and CSS animations, the project offers an aesthetic and interactive player of all of Taylor Swift's albums. It creates an immersive experience for users to discover and listen to her music.
